A Rapid Generalized Minicomputer Text Search System Incorporating Algebraic Entry of Boolean Strategies .A Isenhour, T. L. .A Woodward, W. S. .A Lowry, S. R This paper presents a rapid and efficient generalized minicomputer text searching system.. The system has been applied to Chemical Condensates and enjoys search speeds comparable to services operating on large computer systems.. Complete Boolean algebraic search strategy expressions may be used as direct entries, and all forms of transaction are automatically processed.. Benchmark search speeds and results are presented for realistic profiles serving varied research groups in a major university chemistry department.. .X 124	1	739 125	1	739 127	2	739 129	2	739 141	1	739 190	1	739 191	1	739 197	1	739 211	1	739 214	1	739 218	1	739 243	1	739 307	1	739 330	1	739 363	2	739 378	1	739 409	1	739 432	1	739 450	1	739 451	1	739 452	1	739 459	1	739 460	1	739 461	1	739 468	1	739 484	1	739 492	1	739 508	1	739 511	1	739 512	1	739 514	1	739 518	1	739 520	1	739 523	1	739 524	1	739 525	1	739 526	1	739 529	1	739 530	1	739 534	1	739 546	1	739 553	1	739 563	1	739 579	1	739 580	1	739 594	1	739 603	1	739 604	1	739 606	1	739 609	1	739 610	1	739 611	1	739 612	1	739 622	1	739 625	1	739 626	1	739 630	1	739 636	1	739 637	1	739 642	2	739 643	1	739 644	1	739 645	2	739 646	1	739 647	1	739 648	1	739 649	1	739 650	2	739 651	1	739 692	1	739 696	1	739 699	1	739 703	2	739 705	1	739 708	2	739 726	1	739 727	1	739 728	1	739 731	1	739 732	1	739 733	1	739 734	1	739 736	2	739 737	1	739 738	2	739 739	5	739 740	1	739 741	2	739 742	1	739 743	1	739 744	1	739 755	1	739 820	1	739 826	1	739 827	1	739 879	1	739 881	1	739 882	1	739 883	2	739 884	1	739 885	1	739 886	1	739 887	1	739 917	1	739 999	1	739 1000	1	739 1001	1	739 1002	1	739 1003	1	739 1004	2	739 1035	1	739 1078	1	739 1089	1	739 1091	1	739 1207	1	739 1264	1	739 1297	1	739 1303	1	739 1356	1	739 1364	1	739 1368	1	739 1370	1	739 1372	1	739 1373	1	739 1374	2	739 1375	2	739 1376	3	739 1377	1	739 1377	1	739
